name: cardflasher
description: Online Flash card generator for studying.

scripts.install-all: npm install --prefix server --legacy-peer-deps && npm install --prefix client --legacy-peer-deps
scripts.start: npm run start-server & npm run start-client
scripts.dev: npm run dev-server & npm run dev-client
scripts.install: cd server && npm i && cd ../client && npm i --production=false
